column5: Hi, Can anyone tell me if Rugby Lake (Outside of Dryden) has any public access ramp. Staying at a friends close to there this summer and wondered if there was a place to launch my boat. Any other walleye related info regarding Rugby would be appreciated. Thanks !!!
I have flown into rugby before to visit with friends that were camping there. From what I understand, the only way in is to pay a launching fee at the camp.
skywagon is right. only acess is through the camp.also i hear they can be difficult to deal with.
There are a lot better lakes in the area for walleye fishing than Rugby. If you can, make the trek up to Lac Seul. It's well worth the extra drive!!
We tried to pay a landing fee there and they told us the ramp was for guests of the lodge only.The old owners use to let us pay and launch.
But Wabigoon and Dinorwic are nearby, and lots of places to access.
